title: Greta Van Susteren hired by Newsmax
snippet: Broadcaster Greta Van Susteren has been hired by Newsmax to serve as an anchor on the network, the outlet announced on Tuesday. Susteren will debut on June 14 in a new show based in Washington…

title: Greta Van Susteren Christmas Special Coming on Newsmax
snippet: She will be spotlighting the ministry of Operation Christmas Child as we delivered shoebox gifts to children in need. Her Christmas TV special will be airing at 4 p.m. on Newsmax ...
